website_summaries.verdict: This is a good choice if you're looking for a long-lasting filter to improve your standard city tap water.
pros: Removes sediment, microbial cysts, and chlorine taste and odor
Superior quality at a reasonable price
Improves the taste of the water significantly
cons: You may have trouble fitting the filter under your sink if there isn't a lot of room

customer_reviews.title: Faulty fitting caused a flood in the house
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this on a Wednesday and it arrived Friday. Installed Saturday, reading all the instructions carefully. Ran it for 10 minutes. No leaks. Enjoyed filtered water on Sunday, and clean tasting coffee on Monday morning. Came home Monday evening after work, and the house was flooded. The cold water push-in coupling had failed, and the hose was blown off the valve. Water had been gushing out for hours. There is a problem with the connectors of this unit.
customer_reviews.author: GDA

customer_reviews.title: Great product bad Amazon LLC
customer_reviews.text: The item itself works as described; however, if you are ordering from AMAZON LLC, which is where all of mine came from, then check the item immediately. I had mine switched from the GOLD lettering to GREEN which is a lesser product but I was charged for the GOLD. Since I usually keep an extra one for my future 6 month exchange under the sink, it was too late for me to say anything to Amazon when I actually did change it, so I am saying it to the consumers who are reading this. Good product bad QA on behalf of Amazon LLC.
customer_reviews.author: KH

customer_reviews.title: ripp off!
customer_reviews.text: What is the point of this filter! I was so looking forward getting this filter to replace having to fill out my Zero Water pitcher. As soon as I installed it, I tried the water with a TDS water quality tester and it kept reading 156! over and over again. Without the filer is 164! So again, what is the point fo this filter!! My Zero water pitcher read 005, and that is after 1 month use! This is the most dissapointing purchase I have ever made, can't believe this is a 3M product. I will have to stick to keep filling out my Zero Water pitcher.
customer_reviews.author: C. Feliciano

customer_reviews.title: This water filter is awesome i purchased the maximum version
customer_reviews.text: This water filter is awesome i purchased the maximum version, i read some reviews complaining about flooding and water leaks so i decided to install it in a different way, look at my pictures. First i ordered a "2 way faucet diverter valve" sold here by Expresd Water. Second, i had to order 2 pushfit adapters (3/8 to 1/4) Third i ordered 1/4 water tubing, Installing the system this way prevents it from being pressurized all the time and so preventing a possible flood. I hope this helps someone
customer_reviews.author: Raul

customer_reviews.title: Defective product. The product outer casing fractured and flooded ...
customer_reviews.text: Defective product. The product outer casing fractured and flooded my home in less then 6 hours after I replaced the filter following instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Owen

customer_reviews.title: This thing works great! Cut it open and the results were pretty gross (but a good gross).
customer_reviews.text: This thing is AWESOME. Okay so I'll admit we used ours for 6-8 months, but it still cleaned the water which was good. I'd recommend this to anyone with old pipes or if you just want safer water. If you use humidifiers this is pretty close to what I'd call a demineralization filter (no white dust).
customer_reviews.author: David Prentice

customer_reviews.title: Filters my water!
customer_reviews.text: What do you say in a water filter review? It filters my water under the sink, which I appreciate. I can tell the difference when it nears the "time to change" point. We have the swap out date as Thanksgiving and my husband's birthday. :) Appreciate that there's a spot on there to write the date so you're not wondering, and lovelovelove having it available on auto-ship. When it's that time of year... bingo! it appears. Good for people who don't have the inclination or space for a larger filtration system. It does take up some space under the sink, but it's not too bad.
customer_reviews.author: las

customer_reviews.title: Leaks like hell!
customer_reviews.text: Leaks like hell. I used to have one which doesn't leak but now things are completely different. Their QC is gone. Don't bother to try this product any more. It's COVID-19 now so I throw away all boxes right away. So no return. It goes directly into trash!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: The do the job
customer_reviews.text: We remodel the kitchen 10+ yrs ago and installed one of these to reduce the salt taste in the Cold Water tap in the kitchen, now, let me add that I am cheap and sometimes lazy.. I think you are suppose to change them every 6 months.. nope, not me... I waited 3yrs to change it.. When the flow became a trickle out of the faucet then I knew it was over due.. Once changed, let it run for 5 min to flush it, then everything was good..
customer_reviews.author: Ghost rider

customer_reviews.title: It really works
customer_reviews.text: Like: it works. I cut it open with a hacksaw and was disguised by what was in my water. Easy to change, just make sure it's on all the way before turning the water back on. Dislike: as previously mentioned it does slow the flow of water, and it gets slower as it gets dirtier. But that just means it's working If you aren't familiar with doing plumbing, I'd suggest getting some help from someone who does. I put a splitter on mine and ran one line to the faucet and the other to the ice and water in the fridge.
customer_reviews.author: D. T. Wenzel

customer_reviews.title: Good Filter....
customer_reviews.text: Reading a few of the negative reviews I am guessing that in some cases the problem isn't the filter but water pressure too high (with leaks) OR making the mistake of connecting to a whole house type flow (instead of a single spigot). This filter should only be used for drinking water and a separate tap added (kitchen sink is a good location) and not in a line for the whole house. We get one year out of a single filter with still good flow and taste. It is better than a RO filter since it takes the filtration to a low of .5 microns.
customer_reviews.author: Piloto Jim

customer_reviews.title: JUST DONT
customer_reviews.text: i am no novice.. i built two bathrooms and a kitchen with my own hands including the entire plumbing system.over the last nine years ththose sytems are working fine.But after 5 tries i never could get this system to stay dry. this product WILL leak. the fittings are cheap push in plastic tubing. i gave up and my $53 is now in the dumpster. dont make the same mistake i did.
customer_reviews.author: Michael S.

customer_reviews.title: Works like a champ!
customer_reviews.text: I paid a local plumber to do the install for me - actually a neighbor who works as a plumber. But it doesn't seem like it would have been terribly difficult if one had the right tools and a back that allows them to bend over under the sink for an hour. Anyway, that aside, I love how the product functions. There is no (or very little) discernible decrease in the flow rate. And the water comes out tasting great! All chlorine taste is gone. My morning coffee even tastes better!
customer_reviews.author: Nevada Ron

customer_reviews.title: Beware used filters
customer_reviews.text: I bought this warehouse buy in "very good" condition (and it was from all appearances), but when I eventually got around to swapping it in for my current filter due to a bad taste in the water the taste was even worse after putting the replacement item in. Obviously some unethical buyer of a new filter took advantage of Amazon's return policy to return their old filter as a return of a new item they just purchased. Very happy with the system and the water quality when the filter is good, but I don't recommend buying anything but new filters.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: NOT HAPPY AT ALL
customer_reviews.text: I was not happy when I tried too install this Granted it does install easy IF all the pieces where with it. It was missing the compression fitting which i had too go to home depot too get, it was missing the install guide and information that you would think would come with it. I had to youtube it too see how it all gets installed. A piece was broken but still worked. Honesly I think I received someones return. My water pressure was reduced 25% which states it would not be reduced. In the end IM NOT HAPPY but it works lets just see for how long
customer_reviews.author: Robert C.

customer_reviews.title: Very good filter for well water
customer_reviews.text: These are great for a rural well water tap. We have rusty water and this takes care of that problem. Also any odors are gone too. I have very hard water and so this filter doesn't quite last the 6 months but it easily makes it to 4 months before I have to replace it. Very easy to install the first time following directions and filter changes are quick and easy too.
customer_reviews.author: BanwartM

customer_reviews.title: Failed after 5 years, but replacing with the exact same thing
customer_reviews.text: This is replacement. I bought this same system 5 years ago. Pro: Easy-peasy installation Even easier to change to change filter Water tastes great ! Con: The connector inside the housing failed after five years and leaked all over the cabinet. Opinion: I'm replacing with the same system because I've been very pleased with it Reducing rating by one star because the thing failed after only 5 years
customer_reviews.author: Smitty

customer_reviews.title: Advanced vs Maximum, Go Advanced
customer_reviews.text: So I had two maximum filters since I purchased the filtration unit. And this time I went advanced filter and I must say, I like Advanced better. Filling a 16 ounce cup maximum took 2 to 3 seconds longer than when using the advanced filter. Here in Utah we have great water already, but I just like to filter a little more. And now that I know advanced is faster I will just stick with it from now on.
customer_reviews.author: mjs

customer_reviews.title: Great fill Traciann system at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this filtration system to replace a two stage filter which I had previously purchased at Lowe's. This Filtrete filter installed quickly and easily, and the water pressure coming out is 10 times better than what I had previously experienced with my old filter! Being that I replaced and existing filter ration system, I was able to utilize the tubing from my old system which made installation very quick. If you're going to install from scratch it will take a little more work. I am extremely satisfied with the performance of this filter ration system. I also subscribe to Amazon's automatic filter shipment program, so that A new filter arrives every six months automatically.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Silberman

customer_reviews.title: Best tasting water ever!
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe what a difference a new filter can make. The water tastes amazing and comes through crystal clear. This is a new filter system for this faucet and It's 100% better than the other one we had. The installation is so easy that it made me laugh. Great tasting water, easy install - what more can you ask for.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Decent filter...doesn't last six months however
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews I'm still not sure what a lot of folks were expecting from a filter under fifty bucks! It works as expected and my cold tap water no longer tastes if chlorine. The only negative I found is that the flow falls off around the fourth month, other than that it's easy to install and mounts easily against the side if the cupboard. Decent buy.
customer_reviews.author: Nerekjo

customer_reviews.title: Filters out everything
customer_reviews.text: Got this right before the "lockdown". An awesome product that takes out everything from the tap water and makes it drinkable. Tastes great and you can tell when it is time to replace. We installed this system on the cold water supply 10 years ago under the kitchen sink. The filters are getting harder to find to the auto send option is amazing. Thanks Amazon and seller!
customer_reviews.author: dirtydeedsreviewsyou

customer_reviews.title: Works, but price too high
customer_reviews.text: I feel like the price on this actually came up since I last bought it. It works fine, but watch the price. I hope they don’t continue to up the price
customer_reviews.author: TommyGuitar

customer_reviews.title: Funky taste and smell. Used to be great
customer_reviews.text: These filters used to be great, but the past 2 I’ve received have had a funky taste and smell to the water passing through them. I have to run the water for 60 seconds before the taste and smell goes away and the water is usable. Probably will be my last order of them and am looking at other options now
customer_reviews.author: Peter A King

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: So tired of buying the temporary faucet filters that most the time don't even work. Even worse having to lug home cases of water. If you live in the city, water can be an issue. I feel this was a good decision, easy to install, although it takes a little figuring because the instructions can be confusing. I have noticed a substantial difference in water quality, and I must say it taste better than most bottled water. Since I live in a rental, I used the large 3mm Velcro patch instead of screws and it holds securely.
customer_reviews.author: ScottyH

customer_reviews.title: He doesn't like to drink water (stubborn old man
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my father inlaw who had one put under the sink six years ago. I realized he never changed it! He doesn't like to drink water (stubborn old man!) So i got another one for him.His doctor ordered him to drink more water if he wants to keep his liver. He was using it. I said why not change it if your using it!!Yeah he's very stubborn. He probably didn't know how easy to change and priced reasonably it is.He's a great father in law,and i want him around for as long as we can. Yup!
customer_reviews.author: Lise

customer_reviews.title: This new filter bottle does not work
customer_reviews.text: I used this filter before and had the top part installed. I just got this new filter bottle to replace an old one. It use to I just twist to remove the old one from the cap and twist a new one back in and the water will flow correctly. I replaced the old one with this new one and it was working in the beginning even though the water stream was slower than the old one. Things getting worst after a week. Now water is barely coming through the filter. I will remove the whole filter system and shop for the other one.
customer_reviews.author: WAICHU LAU

customer_reviews.title: Good filter
customer_reviews.text: I bought the system with Max filter, then purchased AQUA CREST filter, then purchase this Advanced filter. Compared all these three types, the taste is ranking is (good to bad): Max, Advanced and AQUA CREST. This one is much better than AQUA CREST. I recommend this one even it costs a few dollar more.
customer_reviews.author: BGee

customer_reviews.title: Fine, Not as Expected
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to put get a filter for my cold water in the kitchen. (For cooking purposes) Our water is fine but rather hard. I chose this one in particular because of its easy installation and the fact that it wouldn’t affect water pressure. Well, it was easy to install but the water pressure is significantly different. I will deal with it for now and will likely replace in the future.
customer_reviews.author: MBezzo

customer_reviews.title: It’s not the same as they use to be.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this filter in August and now, December, it has a funny taste to the water. It’s only four months of use. And we use it mainly when we’re home, morning and evening, since we’re at work or school during the day. My wife and daughter said it’s not the same as it was the last time. Company is not making the same quality filter as they should. 🤦‍♂️ 🤦‍♂️ 🤦‍♂️
customer_reviews.author: Spark-all

customer_reviews.title: Delicious and does not affect flow rate!
customer_reviews.text: Replaced a Honeywell dual-filter under-sink mount with this and are ecstatic with the results. Flow rate is excellent vs the Honeywell that was on there and the water tastes great! We just moved from delicious pure tasting well water to Minneapolis suburbs filled with chemicals and couldn't stand the taste of it (granted the old filter was probably ready to be replaced). Now we are drinking more water then ever and are not noticing any buildup in our Kerug coffee maker. Cost of 1 replacement 3M filter is 50% less then the cost of the 2 Honeywell filters and is rated for twice the capacity without restricting flow.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Rehm

customer_reviews.title: Very low water-flow.
customer_reviews.text: Extremely easy to install, very good no leakage easy snap lock pipe fittings can install in minutes. You will not notice much difference in taste in NYC tap water which is pretty clean itself but always good to filter. The BIGGEST problem is water flow description says waterflow will decline over months but infact it will drastically go down to a espresso like trickle by second week. Plus the replacement filter costs more than the whole system which is weird.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Dasz

customer_reviews.title: Three years, no leaks
customer_reviews.text: I have now had this system for three years. It was not hard to install, but I was afraid that the hoses and couplings were not as robust as I would like. Well, three years and multiple cartridge changes with zero leaks. The filter does slow water flow down a bit (hence my 4 stars), but I assume that's the filter doing its job.
customer_reviews.author: Gerry, Las Vegas

customer_reviews.title: easy to install and water tastes much better
customer_reviews.text: Our neighbor came round and said "why does your water taste so much better than mine?". That says it all. My fridge does not have a water dispenser so put one of these on the island sink for water. Easy to install and the water is improved in flavor
customer_reviews.author: h0b0

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Wouldn’t fit no matter how many fittings I bought, water sprayed everywhere. Unless you are a plumber or own a new house this is almost impossible to install. I spent an extra 25.00 on fittings trying to get it to work no luck.
customer_reviews.author: Ty

customer_reviews.title: Decent alternative to bottled water
customer_reviews.text: Was initially worried about the plastic connections but after following all the steps and keeping a close eye on it for a few weeks things worked perfectly Water flowed slightly slower but we've always had weak water pressure and there wasn't that much of a difference after installing Ended up going with another brand after this "expired" as the price per gallon isn't the best, but it worked fine while it lasted!
customer_reviews.author: D J

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Filter!!!
customer_reviews.text: It's really easy to install this. Not sure why people complain about lack of water pressure. I never noticed any drop of pressure at all. Maybe they need to turn on their cold water main to max instead of a few turns. Anyways, my water tastes great and nolonger smells like mold or algae. Did a lot of research on this, and this has amazing specs and reviews. 0.5um (microns) filtration for drinking water is crazy!!! I really don't think you can do better unless you get into those crazy 3+ step filtration systems with UV filter that only semiconductor plants should use. Believe me, I use to be a Micro Contaminate Engineer at Hynix/ Hyundai Semiconductor.
customer_reviews.author: John Mackerell

customer_reviews.title: Gives me peace of mind.
customer_reviews.text: I'm so glad I bought this. Filtered faucet water? It just gives me a little peace of mind. I use it in the kitchen sink for filling the dog's water bowl and any time I'm using water for cooking. One thing I would do different? Get two and run parallel. That would help keep the pressure up and I imagine the filter life would be the same--just buy two replacement filters at double the single filter interval.... The pressure did seem to increase when I replaced the filter recently. Maybe it's just in my head.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Water went from aweful, to palatable.
customer_reviews.text: Have 2 of these installed now. The connecting components in this kit seem kinda "inadequate" for the job, but they get the job done. Not a single leak below either of my sinks these are under. The filters do wonders for our water. Our water is some of the most disgusting I have ever tasted. Not only does it taste like swamp water, it is heavily chlorinated with lots of fluoride. With these under our sink, the water tastes palatable now. Going to be buying a 3erd for the last bathroom sink in our home.
customer_reviews.author: Steph Leppard

customer_reviews.title: Wished I had done this years ago!
customer_reviews.text: Installed today 04/07/19. Took me about 40 minutes (extra time was being sure I picked the right spot). Because of our existing garbage disposal and drain pipes, had to install farther from cold water shut off than I would have wanted to, but the water line supplied was just long enough. No more having to deal with refrigerator filter (which freezes up all the time).
customer_reviews.author: The Glazier's

customer_reviews.title: Counterfeit?
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been buying this filter for years. Usually they last about 9 months. This only lasted 4 months and It has been tasting bad for a month. Is it counterfeit?
customer_reviews.author: SamJam

customer_reviews.title: Does not affect flow
customer_reviews.text: This took me about 10 mins to install as I simply replaced the one I had which had reduced my CW flow to a trickle. I now get full pressure and the water tastes good. We are in Chicago and it's a bit chlorine tasting, and this has all gone. My only issue with this is that it's a huge bit of plastic that gets discarded when the filter needs replacing.... which is why one star is dropped
customer_reviews.author: Streakybonehead

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Awesome and affordable way to drink clean water. Our tap is deemed safe to drink and has impurities all “within safe limits” but had a mild chlorine odor and taste. This system eliminated both. Not only does it make our water taste better but gives us peace of mind.
customer_reviews.author: E.N.

customer_reviews.title: Why lug bottled  water?
customer_reviews.text: Great tasting water, long lasting (8-12 months); used for our under sink water dispenser. Our city water has an unpleasant aftertaste and I have gotten tired of replacing the fridge in-door filters every few months, I was able to install this second unit in the basement where I had access to the fridge water line. Replaced the in-door filter with the manufacture supplied by-pass and now have great tasting water from a filter that will last much longer and save $$. The Filtrete are 4 times larger than the fridge in-door filters, will last longer, don't cost significantly more, and now my ice tastes good.
customer_reviews.author: tipiw

customer_reviews.title: upon receiving, open carton and inspect product
customer_reviews.text: In the past, I have never had any problem or issue with this filter. However, this time, upon opening the carton on the filter and removing the plastic wrap and red cap from the neck of the filter, I noticed the plastic was broken off where the filter connects to the housing and hoses. Since I did not immediately open and inspect the filter, I am unable to return this unused item. Buyer beware! Always open and inspect your filter upon receiving it.
customer_reviews.author: Goliath

customer_reviews.title: ~ Excellent Under-Sink Filtering System and Refills! ~
customer_reviews.text: We are very happy with this under-dink water filtration setup and have been using it here at our home for a couple of years now. I was happy to find these filters her on Amazon. They are great and our water tastes delicious, clear, and clean. We change out our filter every few months to keep it at its best. This tastes at least as good as any bottled water without filling the world with more plastic. We highly recommend this filtration device with these water filtration replacements. Excellent product!
customer_reviews.author: Small~Town~Girl

customer_reviews.title: Seems ok
customer_reviews.text: I installed this into my RV so it was a bit of a squeeze, not the fault of the filter. Also my water pipe was 1/4 of an inch and the pipe of the filter is 3/8 so I had to buy and install two adapters, again not the filters fault. I will be testing the taste when I go camping next, so update to follow.
customer_reviews.author: Rottsrool

customer_reviews.title: If you're not handy or have never done plumbing, don't attempt this..
customer_reviews.text: I renovate houses, so I have to know at least a little something in all areas of home repair. This only took me 30 minutes, but I ran into problems with room to attach the mounting and the supply was hidden behind the valve, so it wasn't easy to get to. I doubt your under sink is as accessible as in the video. If you decide to do it, make sure all connections are tight. Once you push the blue tubing into the compression fitting, push again to be sure it's tight.
customer_reviews.author: Legend9Nine

customer_reviews.title: Easiest to Install and Very Effective
customer_reviews.text: I have been installing and using under-sink water filters for over thirty years. This filter was the easiest to install that I have ever had. It is amazingly effective at removing the high chlorine content in the water here. I also like the fact that it filters so much other stuff from the water, including cysts. I highly recommend this filter for "do-it-yourselfers."
customer_reviews.author: MikeL

customer_reviews.title: A must Have!
customer_reviews.text: The water in southern AZ is probably the most disgusting I've ever come across. In the area that I live in they don't treat the water except to run it through large sand filters and that's it. I smell like sewer water coming out of your faucet, but they say put a little lemon juice in it to freshen it up. How DISGUSTING! I have multiple filters on my house and reverse osmosis too just to make it palletable. When I found out how much water was being wasted (over a hundred gallons a week) I figured I needed to change something. So I tried this unit and what a difference! No more FECES found in my drinking water.
customer_reviews.author: Deanareno

customer_reviews.title: Filtrete Advanced Under Sink Quick Change Water Filtration System,
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the Filtrete Advanced under sink quick change water filtration system June 15 2019. Hooked up the filter June 16th 2019, by 8/28/2019 the filter has shutdown with no water flow. On the video you can see rusty water dumped in the sink...
customer_reviews.author: H2

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last 3 months let alone 6 months.
customer_reviews.text: When we first ordered the filter and a replacement it lasted close to 5 months. Now it barely lasts 3. We rarely use the cold water so the claim that it lasts 6 months is dubious at best. We were committed to using this system but now we might have to try another brand. It's too bad, installation was decent.
customer_reviews.author: Herbert Williams

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install water filter system
customer_reviews.text: I just installed this filter under my kitchen sink to filter the cold water going to my newly installed instant hot water system. The installation was pretty straightforward with all parts included. The only thing that made me nervous was the quick connect couple used to connect the blue polyethylene tubing to and from the filter housing, as not having physical nuts to tighten always has me worried about leaks. Fortunately, no leaks so far with this system. I'd certainly buy this filter system again in the future if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Cohoman

customer_reviews.title: Great product at a great price
customer_reviews.text: This filter is great! It’s easy to install and works well. We spent years with water filter pitchers and faucet connected filters that kept breaking and had high filter replacement costs. I don’t know why we waited so long to go this route. I installed it in about 20min and the directions were easy to follow. I even talked my family members into buying one and installed it for them, they love it too! If you want easy filtered water, I recommend using this product.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Steinmetz

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy more than 1 at a time
customer_reviews.text: The seller was fine. I ordered 2 of these filters so I would have a spare ready when it was time to replace the first one. I finally got to the 6 month mark for replacing the filter and find out that the second filter does not fit. It has the same model number, but on closer inspection has slight differences in the connection neck. I learned today that the Amazon return policy has a time to return that has passed now that it is 6 months since I purchased this. I will likely purchase another filter, but this is now a lesson not to buy more than what your going to use within the eligible return period.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory

customer_reviews.title: Filter removed 100% of Chlorine Taste
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this Filtrete water filter after much research. Installation is very easy however directions aren't as clear as they could be. The directions state there should be no gap between the filter and the base. I could not make this happen, however, the filter performed as advertised. I would also recommend having some teflon tape handy to ensure connections don't leak. i would like to see 3M beef up the plastic connector for the cold water feed. That would instill more confidence in the long-term performance of this product. Net Net, this is a good product and I'm no longer buying bottled water as the chlorine taste has been filtered out.
customer_reviews.author: richard safton

customer_reviews.title: Great. But lasted only 4 months.
customer_reviews.text: Tastes pretty good. Much more convenient than filling up a Brita tank. Hidden under the sink. However, it does drastically slow down the pressure of my cold water by almost 1/2, which makes it a little frustrating b/c I'd have to end up using more hot water to allow stronger pressure. Will be buying a separate faucet to attach to water drinking filter vs regular cold water. At that point, pressure shouldn't really be an issue for day to day activities like washing dishes.
customer_reviews.author: Matty

customer_reviews.title: Instructions of how to connect this to a water dispenser faucet with a 1/4" connection
customer_reviews.text: This is a great filter! However, I wanted it to be connected to it's own dedicated water dispenser faucet. The faucet I got off amazon had a 1/4" male thread end (compression thread) and the filter has a 3/8" male end (also compression thread). To make this connection you will need two parts available on amazon. You will need two Watts brand products: Watts LFA154 Female Compression x OD Adapter 1/4-Inch x 3/8-Inch (Fine Thread) Watts LFPBCC12-44 Ice Maker Supply Line, 12-Inch Took me forever to find these fittings to make it work, but I wanted to save somebody else the time and hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Great so far
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I bought this is to improve water taste. Our water supply is high quality and always safe to drink. The only issue I have with my water is weak chlorine smell. It's not a health issue, it's only a matter of taste. I bought this so I wouldn't have to buy bottled water and o far so good. All required connections were included in the package and things connected correctly. There are no leaks. I also did not notice any significant pressure drop after installing this filter. Bottom line - this product satisfied my needs. Lets hope I can go at least a couple of months before replacing since replacement cartridges aren't cheap.
customer_reviews.author: dmk

customer_reviews.title: Great taste. Instantly noticeable
customer_reviews.text: I filled a cup of my water before I installed and filled one after and drank them at the same time. The taste was 10x better with this filter. I hate drinking water so I usually don't notice the difference in taste, but this is night and day
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The installation of this product was fast and easy, I was able to do the whole installation ...
customer_reviews.text: The installation of this product was fast and easy, I was able to do the whole installation with a Phillips Head Screwdriver, and a pair of Crescent Wrenches, all in all it probably took 20 minutes. The water quality is amazing, it removed all the horrible odors and tastes and would even venture to say that my tap water now tastes better than my Britta Pitcher. I cleaned out the water bowls for the pets and filled them back up with the new filtered water and when one of them went for a drink he actually stopped looked back at me like, whatever this is I approve! For the price just do it, I promise you will be pleasantly surprised.
customer_reviews.author: merlin696

customer_reviews.title: Unconventional use but great results!
customer_reviews.text: This was bought for a much different reason than drinking water. Our water in the town we live in leaves much to be desired in the mineral area. We were having issues with clogging pores and the accompanying issues after washing faces. I installed these to filter the water under our sinks in our master bathroom and have had great results. No more issues! The packaging comes with tubing, the filter, adapters for the wall connection as well as easy push on connections. No real tools are required except the ones needed to install the wall brackets. I can only imagine that the water tastes as good as it feels when washing your face!
customer_reviews.author: kmurphy

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Gets clogged really fast, I live in New York City and the filter bearly lasted 2 months of light use.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Works great, once you get it installed.
customer_reviews.text: The filter works great, once I got it installed. I've changed the filter many times in the past but this one was very difficult to install. Of course without it I had no water, so I had to figure out something. I ended up removing the permanent section from the wall and placing the top of it against the wall for leverage. Using all my strength I was finally able to get it in place. The design of this particular one looked different although all the numbers matched. I believe the packaging stated something about a new design. I'm worried about the next install and plan to look into other systems.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Tobias

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and great tasting water.
customer_reviews.text: After the water filter on our fridge stopped working, I was searching for an alternative. We tried pitcher filters but we drink a lot of water and that just wasn't practical. Then I found this... This filter took less than 30 minutes to install (and I'm not the most handy person). The water tastes GREAT — it's a huge improvement over the tap water and even over the filtered pitcher water we had before. I'd highly recommend this product to anyone looking for a quick way to get great tasting clean water out of their regular faucet.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Owen

customer_reviews.title: Items were not Filtrete.  Were Clear Choice brand.  Bait and switch!
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why they are not only not what the picture shows but also not the same brand. I received Clear Choice and not Filtrete. Bait and switch? Didn't open the individual boxes until it was past the return window. Shady!
customer_reviews.author: Cenzo

customer_reviews.title: Replace yearly and have decent water
customer_reviews.text: Gets the bad stuff out of water and makes it taste like.. water. City water here smells and tastes like it came from an unsanitary location and the 3M system has worked flawlessly for the last four years. 3M says to replace the filters every 6 months (for such a larger filter?), but I do it each year and have never had a problem with water quality, taste or flow rate. It does slow down a little each month but not enough to be replaced before a year has passed. Only two of us live here and if we were a family of 4, then it might be necessary to purchase one each 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: K Guillory

customer_reviews.title: Look elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: It cleared the particles from the water, but the taste is horrible. Pretty much undrinkable unless the water is ice cold. Update: I bought a new filter and it wouldn't seat correctly and just spun in the housing. It wouldn't let water through it or anything. I tried to reset several times but it started shooting water everywhere. I have now bypassed the filter and am currently shopping for a different system.
customer_reviews.author: Edward R. Skalitzky

customer_reviews.title: poor filter
customer_reviews.text: The filter is not good and it there is grose odor when water runs through the filter and its just one month old and its bad. I never recommend this filter to anyone
customer_reviews.author: Arunkumar

customer_reviews.title: Works for me
customer_reviews.text: The filter seems to do what it is suppose to do. Needs to be changed about every 6 months. A noticeable drop in pressure after 6 months. I try to get 1 year from mine.
customer_reviews.author: frank

customer_reviews.title: Check the part number
customer_reviews.text: Filtrete 3US-PF01 is an excellent replacement and works without any issues. Write the expiration on the filter so it's easily viewable to know when it due to be replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Ron_L

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this filter system for about 5 years. We had really heavy iron deposits in our well water. This helped out. Eventually, we purchased a new water softener which resolved most/all of the iron issue. I still have this connected to our kitchen sink as a extra layer of protection. I also have this on subscribe and save for delivery every 6 mos. Pretty simple to change out and worry free. There is a slight reduction in pressure, but not significant. I've noticed our animals prefer water from this faucet rather than others.
customer_reviews.author: Russell Burns

customer_reviews.title: Great filter, very satisfied...
customer_reviews.text: Been using a Brita Pitcher for a while, and it could never get the nasty taste out of the tap water in my city.. This thing however, is awesome. Tastes better than bottled water and was simple to install. Also love that you don't have to turn the water feed off to change the filter. Filtrete has great products.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement for the discontinued A1 cartridge
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I could not find a 3M A1 replacement cartridge. Apparently that product has been discontinued. I was pleasantly surprised to find that this cartridge worked as an exact replacement for the A1 cartridge so it was not necessary to use the included fittings and hoses. I just unscrewed the A1 cartridge and screwed this one back in its place. It is a couple of inches longer than the A1 cartridge so make sure that you have room for it under the cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: BigSkyCountry

customer_reviews.title: Installed easily, works great
customer_reviews.text: Installed easily, but one caveat - I was replacing an existing filter of another brand, so I didn't have to tap into the cold water line directly, so I can't rate how easy it was to install that part. The only problem I had dealt with re-using a coupling from the old installation, which leaked. All the couplings on the Filtrete product were solid, but did take a little more force than you'd expect. One coupling seemed like it was in firmly, but wasn't - you need a solid push until the tubing will really go no father. If you do it right, you push on it, feel the resistance give way, then the tubing will seat in the coupling.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Koziar

customer_reviews.title: The Filter to have
customer_reviews.text: You won’t believe the difference this filter makes in the taste and appearance of your water. I’ve had one for years and got this one for my daughters house. Very easy to install and change the filter on. Much better than the canister type filters.
customer_reviews.author: Jack of all trades

customer_reviews.title: Better than 3US-AF01
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased the standard filter, (AF-01) and discovered poor performance. We live in Colorado, where the water quality is excellent, but sometimes has more Chlorine and other additives. The AF left an "old" odor in our drinking water frequently, and after a few hours what looked like aeration bubbles. The PF-01 seems to work much better, with no detectable odor or other negatives. For us, it works better and is worth the extra $$. Previously, we had a drinking water only dispenser from GE, which we actually preferred, but decided to get the 3M cold water filtering system. Had I to do it again, I'd opt for only the drinking water system.
customer_reviews.author: Colorado Guy

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Works as promised- 1 month into use has not reduced water pressure. Hint- I used it in my kitchen faucet to have clean water to cook and to reduce the mess caused by scale buildup (I closed to the hot water line as that one can't be filtered- wife did not noticed hot water was closed- which means it is not needed). For drinking I prefer a more comprehensive solution such as reverse osmosis- so- I installed both- this for the faucet and iSpring system for reverse osmosis. Very easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I find these to be a bit pricey, but these filters are quality. The water does taste better. I also like that I'm not adding to the plastic waste of the world with water bottles. This also allows me to cook with clean water and keeps the fridge from becoming cluttered.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Reasonable install, good water flow
customer_reviews.text: The single best thing I like about this system is that I don't have to have either a pitcher or a faucet filter to get my filtered water. Just turn on the cold water on my kitchen sink, and there it is--filtered water. I did notice a drop in flow and pressure, but it's miles and miles better than the trickles that came out of the faucet filter I had on there before (A culligan by the way: quite good at filtering). I didn't like the filter bracket install process however: the self-tapping screws just wouldn't hold onto the backboard under the sink. I had to use glue..... Overall, a neat setup.
customer_reviews.author: galahad05

customer_reviews.title: It was funny that this filter is actually not just a filter ...
customer_reviews.text: It was funny that this filter is actually not just a filter but the entire system and it's less expensive than the other filter. The challenges that there's no more advanced filter that fits this system. I wish that they had a more advanced 3M filter that has the same fitting as this one I was given the wrong one as a recommendation by 3M.
customer_reviews.author: Steven C.

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: This is great. I can drink my city water again. I was tired of buying bottle water. This filter unit did the trick. My water no longer smells or tastes bad. It tastes the same as the bottle water that I was buying. Now I know my water is clean.
customer_reviews.author: David Gifford

customer_reviews.title: Makes well water drinkable. Lasts 3 to 4 months
customer_reviews.text: These filters work quite well. Removes the oder and nasty taste from my well water. The ultimate ones drop water pressure by atleast half so I now use the advanced ones. The advanced seem to filter the same but only lose maybe 10% water pressure. Only negative is I get 3 months, maybe 4 before the filter is full. And that is with light use on my bathroom sink. Mainly used for teeth brushing.
customer_reviews.author: Some Guy

customer_reviews.title: $$ Would be great if there were generic alternatives
customer_reviews.text: It's expensive. The "not advanced" filter is barely cheaper so that won't save much money. However, it's still cheaper than buying bottled water if someone in your household refuses to drink tap water. I've stated before and I will repeat now - the municipal water supply where I live is perfectly safe. I bought this to remove chlorine taste. I have it connected straight to kitchen sink so it's used for drinking water and occasional dish rinsing. With this setup the filter lasts about 6 months before it becomes less effective.
customer_reviews.author: dmk

customer_reviews.title: Just got better
customer_reviews.text: Quick change mount takes seconds. Let it run for 1 min to clear the charcoal and your done. Love the improvement by 50% better flow. We use this for cooking and drinking.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian

customer_reviews.title: Sceptic
customer_reviews.text: When my husband decided to purchase the Filtrete under sin water filtration system, I did not believe that it would make a significant difference. I wanted to purchase a free standing water cooler with jugs. Well...this is great and works really well to remove the chemical, gross taste from our water. For the first time in three years (moving to Texas), I am drinking water from the sink and so are my children. The equipment itself was incredibly easy to install and so far no leaks. The water does come out of the faucet slightly slower than normal but its not significant enough to matter. We are very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: lmorning

customer_reviews.title: Quality, proper match
customer_reviews.text: Had to replace the old one, they last for up to 6 months, went to Lowes, wow didn't know customer service was that bad there, no wonder the store was empty, went to Home Depot, didn't have the item either but were helpful. What I'm getting at is save yourself some time, reasonable price, no hassle hook-up and your all set, didn't remember to check for cracks, but no leaks under the sink is always a good indicator. Will be back in six months, thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Evangelista

customer_reviews.title: great solution for water quality
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful replacement for the counter model we had previously. By mounting under the sink it clears counter space and doesn't require refilling. We can readily tell the difference in the taste of the water through the filter. One caution when mounting under the sink you encounter a conflict. You can mount it on a back wall nicely out of the way, but the downside is that when it comes time to change the filter you will have a difficult task. Mounting it close to the front takes precious room, but makes changing the filter insert much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Emerson Boozer Guy

customer_reviews.title: As good as usual
customer_reviews.text: This 3M Advanced Water Filtration works as described. It does remove some odors from the tap water, however, it also reduces some water flow. The situation gets worse as days go by. Usually that would be the time to replace a new one. Overall, I am happy with this fileter.
customer_reviews.author: Coody

customer_reviews.title: Great for filtering water going into fridge, especially if you have the water in the door feature..
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be very well made and was fairly easy to install. Of course it's always tight working under the sink, but end result was worth it. I don't see any problem with future leakage as some have said, just be sure to make a straight cut on the hose and push it into the fitting completely. I did need to buy one additional fitting for my application. $3.00 at Lowes, no big deal! The only thing I would recommend is to order an additional filter right away. It would be good to always have one on hand.
customer_reviews.author: OTK

customer_reviews.title: Easy Installation for basic handyman
customer_reviews.text: If you have basic handyman skills and tools, installation is easy. Tools needed include: phillips screwdriver, awl, pencil, drill, 5/8" wrench, adjustable wrench, utility light, small level (optional) to level unit. No tube cutting was needed. Parts list and instructions are excellent, but one error. Page 5 mixed up the (F) and (G) labels in "Compression Assembly" Step 1. But I figured out the error with no problem. Unit looks nice, and fits under the sink well. The actual filter fits easily, and replacement after 6 months will also be easy. Definitely 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Leonard S. Joesten

customer_reviews.title: An excellent product all around!
customer_reviews.text: The water quality around here is beyond bad; the amount of chlorine our local water company puts in the water is borderline criminal. This little baby takes care of the problem like it never existed. The setup was easy. I ended up not mounting it on the wall like the instructions suggest due to the fact that the blue water lines/hoses that came with it were a bit short for my setup. So the filter is just sitting under the sink. No harm, no problem, works like a champ. Kids are happy, coffee and tea taste normal again, and no more expensive water bottles for this household.
customer_reviews.author: Giovanni T.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my apartment
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my apartment because the pipes tend to spit out a lot of rust and sediment, even after running them for a prolonged period. I was using a pitcher filter but wanted to use this instead, so I could switch to a glass pitcher instead. It installed quickly and easily and if I want to take it with me when I move someday, removing it won't be a problem. Best of all, my water pressure really isn't affected much (especially as compared to the faucet mounted options I've tried in the past), at the most I see a 10-15% reduction in pressure, and the water is now clear of sediment right out of the tap.
customer_reviews.author: H

customer_reviews.title: Good under the sink drinking water filter system!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this filtration system for several years now and I must say that it works quite well. The paper work indicates that it filters down to 2 microns which is an extremely fine filtration system (it does depend on the filter cartridge that you buy also, so get a good one) This was easy to install and has been maintenance free since installed.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: No Brainer
customer_reviews.text: If you have the Filtrete Under-Sink Water Filter System (3US-PS01), you need to replace the filter. The filter you need to use is this one. One of the nice things about buying from Amazon, is that you have choices. At the top of the page, under the "Add to cart" box is a box for "More Buying Choices." Click the link for "used and new." No, you're not going to buy used filter. But you may find one with box damage or cosmetic imperfections. You can save money and still get a perfectly fine filter. But the choice is always yours. You need the filter, but you can decide how much to spend.
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: Something is wrong with my filter.
customer_reviews.text: I have had this filter for a month and a half now. Up until this past week everything was good. Now the water tastes of chemicals (a kerosene smell and chemical taste). I removed the filter immediately. I am not sure if it was a bad filter or not. Now my water tastes and smells fine without this filter.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Water from the Heavens
customer_reviews.text: I really can't praise this filter highly enough. In my home in California the water is so bad that when you shower, if you get even a few drops in your mouth, it makes you gag. With this jewel under my sink, the water comes out clean and odor free. No solvent - start on fire - swamp gas - phewy - just nice clean tasting stuff. Yes I installed a filter in my shower too but that's a different review. If you have bad water, start with this product.
customer_reviews.author: JoeKing

customer_reviews.title: It is no better than fridge filters
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to setup and connect but I think it did not make any change in water quality because I tested it many times with a conductivity meter and the numbers were same when I compare it. Also there was some crystal structures look like salt, sugar when you boil the water. This was also the reason I wanted to try this. Then I returned it and refunded without any problem
customer_reviews.author: grbz

customer_reviews.title: Best filter ever
customer_reviews.text: I love this filter I’ve been using this for 5yrs now and although the filter says to change every 6 months I do it every 3. The amount of $ I save on buying water bottles is well worth it to me. I highly recommend especially for anyone living in Las Vegas, as the water quality is terrible here.
customer_reviews.author: JOHN

customer_reviews.title: Easy installation and water tastes great.
customer_reviews.text: It says 30 minutes to install but it only took me about 10 minutes. I spread everyting out and read the directions through then just took my time. Most parts are plastic so do not overtighten, tighten some then see if it leaks and if it does tighten a little more. The water tastes great and a really noticible difference from before. The only soso comment I can add is it does slow water output atleast on my sink. I would say about a 25% decrease in flow but still decent enough. FWIW, I have tried the faucet mount filters, pitcher types and other ones like that and even this reduced flow is 100x faster flow than any of these.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

product_meta.title: Filtrete Advanced Undersink Water Filtration System, Easy to Install (3US-PS01)
product_meta.description:
Style:Filtration SystemFiltrete professional water filtration system, 5. 75 inch x 15. 625 inch x 4. 25 inch professional water filtration system, easy way to add filtered water to an existing Faucet, filter head/bracket, 5' x 3/8 inch tubing, 3/8 inch x 1/2 inch Faucet adaptor, 3/8 inch ferrule, 3/8 inch compression Hex Nut, 3/8 inch tube insert, 2 Phillips mounting screws, one 3us-pf01 filter cartridge, filter replacement reminder sticker, filter performance data sheet, removes the following contaminants: 96. 6percent of chlorine, 96. 6percent of bad taste & odor, 99. 8percent of particulates, class I, 99. 99percent of cysts, sediment, sand, soil, silt, rust, does not remove fluoride. 6 months or 2,000 gallons filter life, whatever comes first, 1. 5 gallons per minute flow rate, 25-125 PSI operating pressure, 40- 100 degrees Fahrenheit operating temperature, 0. 5 Micron rating, includes installation & operating instructions, 1 year limited warranty
Important instructions: Filtrete Under Sink water filters should be changed every 6 months or less. Whole House filters vary from 3 months to 12 months depending upon the system. Each filter has a filter life noted on the package and also identified on our website product details 
Filtrete Under Sink water filters reduce particulates and contaminants ranging from Sediment to Health Effect Contaminants such as Lead, Pharmaceuticals, and Chemicals. Choose from Cleaner Water to Healthy Living under sink filter solutions
Filtrete Whole House water filters reduce sand, sediment, rust & sol to chlorine taste & odor throughout your home. Choose from a range of Cleaner Water solutions from (50 Microns to 5 microns with lower microns reducing more particulates) to Great Taste (chlorine taste & odor) solutions
Cleaner Water filtration reduces sand, sediment, rust and soil from 50 microns to 5 microns (5 microns reduces more) - Great Taste water filtration includes Cleaner Water filtration and reduces chlorine taste and odor - Healthy Living water filtration includes Cleaner Water filtration, Great Taste water filtration and reduces microbial cysts and other health effect contaminants such as lead, pharmaceuticals, and chemicals (depending upon the system and filter)

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
From the Manufacturer Now you can have cleaner, great tasting water at your convenience, fresh from your tap. Filtrete under-sink water filtration products are easy to install, with no mess, long lasting replacement filters that can be changed with just a twist. And using filtered water from home as an alternative to bottled water. You will need an adjustable wrench and a screw driver. Turn off the cold water supply and remove supply line to faucet using wrench. Install push-in fittings to faucet and cold water supply line. Install filter mounting bracket to area under sink. Install filter to mounting bracket. Cut tubing "to length" to fit between filter and supply line and from filter to faucet. Connect the tubing. Turn on water supply and enjoy cleaner, better tasting water. Dimensions: 7.1'' H x 14.5'' W x 4.3'' D.

Maintains full water flow on your existing faucet

Consider an upgrade to the Filtrete Maximum Under Sink Filter for 99.3% Lead Reduction
No dedicated faucet. Easily connects to your kitchen or any bath faucet
